summary: Completed testing of Beast Transformation Hub - Weekly Summary Report and Workout Tracking features. All backend tests passed (23/23). Frontend UI verified working with all features functional.
critical_code_review_comments: Weekly Summary API: Returns comprehensive stats including habits rate, prep rate, workouts count, and body progress
Weekly Summary UI: 4 stat cards (Habits, Prep, Workouts, Body) display correctly with real-time data
AI Weekly Coaching: Generates personalized feedback based on weekly stats (~10 seconds response time)
Workout Tracker: Shows today's workout with workout type, duration, and exercise list
Log Workout Modal: Allows selecting workout type, setting duration, adding exercises with sets/reps/weight
Exercise Suggestions: Workout type selection shows relevant suggested exercises (e.g., Back Squat, Leg Press for Lower A)
Workout Persistence: Saved workouts persist to database and display immediately in UI
Weekly Summary Updates: Workouts count and total minutes update in real-time after logging workout

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all Weekly Summary and Workout Tracking features verified)

seed_data_creation: Created test workout during UI testing (cleaned up after)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Weekly Summary and Workout Tracking features fully implemented and tested. Weekly Summary section shows at bottom of dashboard with 4 stat cards. 'Get AI Coaching' button generates personalized feedback. Workout Tracker shows today's workout or 'No workout logged today'. Log Workout modal allows full workout logging with exercise suggestions based on workout type.

tests_performed.details: Returns week_start, week_end, habits (completed/total/streak/rate), meals (planned/prepped/prep_rate), nutrition, workouts (completed/total_minutes/sessions), body_progress
Returns coaching feedback and summary data. AI generates personalized feedback based on weekly stats.
Returns array of recent workouts with limit parameter support
Returns workout for specific date or null if not found
Creates new workout or updates existing (upsert). Includes date, workout_type, exercises, duration_minutes, notes
Adds exercise to existing workout or creates new workout if not exists
Deletes workout for specific date. Returns 404 if not found.
Returns progress history for specific exercise with volume calculation
Section displays with 4 stat cards: Habits (rate %), Prep (rate %), Workouts (count), Body (weight/BF change)
Button opens modal, shows 'Generating...' while AI processes, displays personalized coaching feedback
Shows 'Today's Workout' with workout type, duration, exercise count, and exercise list
Button with data-testid='log-workout-btn' opens workout modal
Dropdown with workout types: Lower A, Upper A, Lower B, Upper B, Full Body, Cardio/HIIT, Active Recovery, Custom
Suggested exercises appear based on workout type (e.g., Back Squat, Leg Press for Lower A)
Form with exercise name, sets, reps, weight inputs. Add Exercise button adds to list.
Save button persists workout to database, closes modal, updates UI immediately
After saving workout, Today's Workout section shows workout type, duration, exercise count, and exercise details

api_tests_summary.POST /api/ai/weekly-coaching: PASS - Returns AI coaching feedback (~10s response)
api_tests_summary.GET /api/workouts/progress/{exercise}: PASS - Returns exercise progress with volume
